articles.title: Video: Ex-Trump aide says Trump mishandling classified documents - CNN Video
articles.description: Ex-Trump White House press secretary Stephanie Grisham says the former president did not handle classified documents properly and wasn't pressed up on his staff to handle properly.

articles.author: Tara Subramaniam, CNN
articles.title: 'A force of nature': Friends, co-stars and fans pay tribute to Olivia Newton-John
articles.description: Hollywood icons joined fans worldwide to mourn the loss of Olivia Newton-John, the Australian singer and "Grease" star, who died Monday at her ranch in Southern California at age 73.
articles.content: The whole world will feel this heartbreak today because the entire world felt Olivia's unmatched light. A force for good. A force of nature. Strong and kind. My mentor, my friend, my inspiration, som… [+152 chars]

articles.title: Albuquerque police are trying to piece together what led up to the killings of 4 Muslim men as anxiety spreads within the community

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The extraordinary political storm unleashed by the FBI search of Trump's Florida resort
articles.description: The FBI search of Donald Trump's Florida resort is an extraordinary, historic development given that it targeted a former President of the United States and set off a political uproar he could use to stoke his likely 2024 White House bid.

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, CNN
articles.title: FBI executes search warrant at Mar-a-Lago, Trump says
articles.description: The FBI executed a search warrant on Monday at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, the former President confirms to CNN.
articles.content:
(CNN)The FBI executed a search warrant on Monday at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, the former President confirms to CNN.
This story is breaking and will be updated.
